activities: The Vitality Group administers a wellness program which entails maintaining, processing and reporting on various aspects of PHI the member chooses to turn in. We maintain all information for the duration of a membership.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organizational, Client data, Customer confidential information, identifiable financial and health information some processed manually and some processed automatically.
privacyprograms: TVG self regulates to abide by HIPAA, HITECH, Safe Harbor and all applicable US Federal laws, acts and regulations
